ModMetaData.name: Decadents
ModMetaData.author: gilith59
ModMetaData.description:
Introducing Decadents, three drug-dependent xenotypes that must consume specific substances to survive. Each xenotype has unique mechanics, specialized rest chambers, and connectable buildings that grant permanent bonuses.
üç∫ Le Festoyeur (The Reveler) A beer-loving barbarian warrior who thrives on alcohol and close combat. Uses a Beer Casket for rest and can connect Beer Amplifiers and Ambrosia Infusers for permanent stat bonuses.
üíâ Le Baron (The Baron) A high-speed stimulant addict with enhanced consciousness and movement. Uses a Stim Casket and connects Wake-up Injectors, Go-juice Pumps, Flake Dispensers, and Yayo Refiners for combat and work bonuses.
üåø Le R√™veur (The Dreamer) A mystical psychedelic user with enhanced psychic abilities and social skills. Uses a Dream Casket and connects Smokeleaf Vaporizers and Psychite Diffusers for peaceful and intellectual bonuses.
Key Features: - Three unique xenotypes with custom resource systems (Beergen, Stimgen, Dreamgen) - Specialized rest caskets that consume drugs to restore resources - Connectable buildings that apply permanent hediff bonuses - Unique gene combinations for each playstyle - Full drug tolerance and no addiction to their respective substances - Inspired by Sanguophage deathrest mechanics
Transform your colony with these substance-dependent beings and master the art of drug production to keep your Decadents thriving!
Requires: Biotech DLC
